headline: Is EOG Resources (EOG) Still Attractive After Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: For investors considering whether EOG Resources at around US$122 per share still offers value, or if most of the opportunity is already priced in, this article walks through the key clues in the valuation. The stock has returned 1.3% over the last 7 days and 12.9% over the past month, while the 1 year return is a 5.1% decline and the 5 year return is 140.4%. Recent coverage has focused on EOG Resources as a large US energy producer, with attention on how it is positioned within the broader...
